items.a: Formal attire. Men: dark suit. Women: long dress or cocktail dress. We recommend guests avoid wearing white.
Of course, children are welcome. Please let us know in the RSVP how many children will accompany you so we can prepare children's menu and activities.
Your presence is our best gift. If you wish to honor us with a gift, we would appreciate contributions toward our honeymoon.

items.q: How late will the celebration last?
items.a: The party will continue until approximately 4:00 AM. Get ready to dance all night!

items.q: Will there be a coat check?
items.a: Yes, we'll have a coat check so you can safely store your belongings.

items.q: Can I take photos during the ceremony?
items.a: We prefer you enjoy the moment. We'll have professional photographers who will share all photos with you. During the banquet and party, photos are more than welcome!

footer.text: We can't wait to celebrate this special day with you
